tool_description: An tool to encrypt and decrypt data through passwords, Auto password generations with security levels are available. Secure MD5 Hashing static encryption also available.
name: Encryptor
title: Encryptor

api_list.name: Static Encryption (MD5 Hashing)
api_list.description: "Static Encryption" is an API endpoint that provides MD5 encryption functionality. MD5 is a widely used cryptographic hash function that takes an input (in this case, a string) and produces a fixed-size hash value. Although MD5 is fast and efficient, it is considered insecure for cryptographic purposes due to its vulnerability to collision attacks. However, it can still be useful in non-cryptographic scenarios, such as checksum verification or data integrity checks. This API endpoint can be utilized to quickly generate MD5 hashes of input strings. While MD5 is not recommended for secure data protection, it can still be useful for simple data transformations and non-security-critical tasks.

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description: The \"data\" parameter is a crucial input for the \"Static Encryption\" API endpoint. It represents the text or data that needs to be encrypted using MD5. By providing the \"data\" parameter, users can generate an MD5 hash, which is a fixed-size string derived from the input data. This parameter plays a central role in the encryption process, allowing users to transform their data into a unique hash value. It is important to ensure that the \"data\" parameter contains the desired text or data to obtain accurate and meaningful encryption results.

api_list.name: Decryption
api_list.description: The Decryption Method endpoint complements the Encryption Method by offering a seamless decryption process. By providing the encrypted data and the correct decryption key, this endpoint allows you to reverse the encryption and retrieve the original data. Safely decrypt sensitive information for authorized access or processing, ensuring data integrity and confidentiality throughout your systems.

required_parameters.name: password
required_parameters.description: The password parameter in the decryption process is essential for securely retrieving encrypted data. By providing the correct password, you can successfully decrypt and access your sensitive information. It acts as the decryption key, ensuring that only authorized individuals with the correct password can access the decrypted data. Integrate this functionality to securely decrypt your data, enabling authorized users to retrieve and utilize the original information while maintaining the confidentiality and integrity of your data.

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description: The data parameter is crucial for the decryption process, allowing you to retrieve and access your encrypted data securely. By passing the encrypted data through the decryption process with the correct password, the data is transformed back into its original, readable format. This enables authorized users to retrieve and utilize the decrypted information for further processing or analysis while maintaining data integrity. Integrate this functionality to securely decrypt your data and gain access to the original information, ensuring confidentiality and authorized data utilization.

api_list.name: Encryption
api_list.description:
The Encryption Method endpoint provides a robust encryption mechanism to secure your sensitive data. Using industry-standard encryption algorithms, it transforms your data into an unreadable format, ensuring confidentiality and protection against unauthorized access.

To encrypt your data, simply provide the data to be encrypted. Additionally, you have the option to provide a password for added security. If no password is provided, the endpoint automatically generates a strong, randomly generated password based on your desired security level. You can specify the security level (0, 1, or 2) to manage the auto-generated password's complexity.

The auto password generation feature saves you time and ensures strong password selection without the need for manual input. However, if you prefer, you can provide your own password, which should be at least a certain length (minimum length requirements apply).

Upon successful encryption, the endpoint returns the encrypted data and the chosen or auto-generated password. Safely transmit or store the encrypted data, knowing that it can only be decrypted using the correct password.

Integrate the Encryption Method endpoint into your application via RapidAPI to enhance the security of your data and protect it from unauthorized exposure.

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description: The data parameter is the input that you want to encrypt securely. Whether it's sensitive user information, financial data, or any other confidential data, the data parameter ensures that your information remains protected. By passing your data through the encryption process, it is transformed into an unreadable format, rendering it safe from unauthorized access. Integrate this functionality to encrypt your data effortlessly, ensuring the confidentiality and integrity of your information throughout your systems.

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: The password parameter in the encryption process adds an extra layer of security to your data. With a minimum length requirement, it ensures stronger passwords to protect your sensitive information. The auto password generation feature generates secure passwords based on three security levels (0, 1, or 2), simplifying password management. Integrate this functionality to encrypt your data with ease, whether by providing a strong password or leveraging the convenience of auto-generated passwords, safeguarding your data against unauthorized access.
